item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Kumo
7 Elm Street (corner of Elm & State)
New Haven, CT 06511

Come join us at this great Japanese Restaurant/Bar. In the words of the New Haven Register's food critic: "Kumo is tasty. Kumo is attractive. And this fall, Kumo is a stone cold bargain. Does that mean I think you should run out right now and order up a boatload of sushi at Kumo? Why yes, yes it does."

They will put out tasty treats for us and have drink specials too.

Contact is: Ed (203) 583-9668

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Kumo New Haven
